title: Model-Based Inquiry Instructional Design to Enhance Middle School Students' Understanding of Molecular Biology and Genetics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology knowledge, fundamental principles of genetic phenomena, and general understanding of curriculum design
context.additional_context: A course enhancing pre-service teachers' instructional design capabilities to effectively teach molecular biology genetics to middle school students, implementing experiential learning environments through simulation and VR technologies

learning_goals: Learners can extract and apply three or more molecular biology genetics concepts suitable for middle schoolers' cognitive development stages.
Learners can design genetics simulation activities for middle schoolers using model-based inquiry learning strategies.
Learners can develop instructional materials visualizing gene expression processes in VR environments and evaluate their educational effectiveness.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
